name: Drake, Vapor
movement: walk 30 ft., fly 50 ft., swim 20 ft.
description: The Drake, Vapor is a sizable, agile dragon with a demeanor reflecting its untamed swamp habitat. It has a sturdy natural armor and a fearsome appearance suitable for ambush tactics.
memorable: Notable for its ability to ambush foes using camouflage in swampy terrain and its unique Diving Pounce ability.
goals: Typically hunts in swamp habitats, using stealth and ambush to catch prey.
relations: Often encountered near swamps and may communicate with swampland beasts.
strengths: High Dexterity enhances its agility in battle; immunity to poison and resistance to cold damage.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and Charisma affect its strategic and social capabilities; loses flight if unable to access swamp gases.
attacks: Employs a Multiattack pattern including a Bite that deals piercing damage and has a chance to poison the target; Claw attacks deal slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Poisonous Breath, exhaling a 30-foot cone of poisonous gas that can incapacitate foes.
senses: Possesses darkvision and a passive perception score of 15, making it quite aware of its surroundings.
skills: Has proficiency in perception, allowing it to be fairly aware of surroundings.
additional_information: Able to communicate with swampland beasts via Speak with Beasts.
Gaseous Ascension allows flight dependent on inhaling swamp gases.
Swamp Camouflage provides advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks in swampy terrain.
test_queries: dragon that communicates with swamp beasts
venomous dragon with stealthy camouflaging abilities
